mapper.select: select * from( select news_no , user_name , news_title , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(news_content, 1000, 1) as "news_content" , to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , thumbnail , profile , count(CASE WHEN z.status = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as "likeCount" from tb_news n join tb_member using(user_no) left join tb_news_zzim z using(news_no) where n.status='Y' group by news_no, user_name, news_title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(news_content, 1000, 1),to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), thumbnail, profile order by news_no desc) where rownum BETWEEN 1 and 12

select news_no , user_name , news_title , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(news_content, 1000, 1) as "news_content" , to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , thumbnail , profile , count(CASE WHEN z.status = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as "likeCount" from tb_news n join tb_member using(user_no) left join tb_news_zzim z using(news_no) where n.status='Y' group by news_no, user_name, news_title, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(news_content, 1000, 1),to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), thumbnail, profile order by news_no desc

select news_no , user_name , comment_content , to_char(comment_date,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') "COMMENT_DATE" , profile from tb_news_comments nc join tb_member on(user_no = comment_writer) where nc.status = 'Y' and news_no = #{nNo} order by comment_date asc

select news_no , user_name , news_title , news_content , to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "create_date" , profile from tb_news n join tb_member using(user_no) where n.status = 'Y' and news_no =#{nNo}
select count(*) as "count" from tb_news_comments where news_no =#{nNo} and status= 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_news_zzim ( news_no , user_no , update_date , status ) values ( #{newsNo} , #{userNo} , sysdate , 'Y' )
mapper.select: select count(*) as "count" from tb_news_zzim where news_no = #{newsNo} and status = 'Y'
